title: H, D, T sputtering yield data
content:
정박사님께서 알려주신 sputtering yield 자료입니다.

참조하시기 바랍니다.

Title: Computer Simulation and Data Compilation of Sputtering Yield by Hydrogen Isotopes (^1H^+, ^2D^+, ^3T^+) and Helium (^4He^+) Ion Impact from Monatomic Solids at Normal Incidence

Link: http://www.nifs.ac.jp/report/NIFS-DATA-031.pdf
